Package au.edu.sydney.pac.erp.feaa

Class FEAAFacadeImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.sydney.pac.erp.feaa.FEAAFacadeImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEAAFacade
    public class FEAAFacadeImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FEAAFacade
    Default implementation of the FEAAFacade interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FEAAFacadeImpl()
      This is just the default constructor - you may rely on it being present in the module you test.

      Preconditions:
      None
      Postconditions:
      Note that this does NOT inject a client provider, the initial state is with this provider being null.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int addAccount​(java.lang.Integer accountID, int clientID, java.lang.String accountName, int initialIncomings, int initialOutgoings)
      Adds an account to the given client

      Preconditions:
      The FEAAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a Client module via FEAAFacade.setClientProvider
      Postconditions:
      An account will be added to the given client with the provided details.
      Client addClient​(java.lang.String fName, java.lang.String lName, java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      Adds a new client to the system.

      Preconditions:
      The FEAAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a Client module via FEAAFacade.setClientProvider
      Postconditions:
      A new client with the given information will be present in the system.
      void assignClient​(int clientID, java.lang.String departmentCode)
      Assigns a client to a department.

      Postconditions:
      None

      Preconditions:
      The FEAAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a Client module via FEAAFacade.setClientProvider
      Postconditions:

      Preconditions:

      Postconditions:

      void setAccountIncomings​(int id, int incomings)
      Sets the income portion of the given account.

      Preconditions:
      The FEAAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a Client module via FEAAFacade.setClientProvider
      Postconditions:
      The selected account incomings will reflect the new value.
      void setAccountOutgoings​(int id, int outgoings)
      Sets the outgoing portion of the given account.

      Preconditions:
      The FEAAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a Client module via FEAAFacade.setClientProvider
      Postconditions:
      The selected account outgoings will reflect the new value.
      void setClientProvider​(ClientList provider)
      Injects a client module provider to the system

      Preconditions:
      None
      Postconditions:
      The system will call the given provider for all client related operations
      All accounts will be cleared, and the null ID state for new accounts will be reset.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> viewAllClients()
      Returns a list of all current clients represented by "last name, first name"

      Preconditions:
      None
      Postconditions:
      None

    • Method Detail

      • addClient

        public Client addClient​(java.lang.String fName,
                        java.lang.String lName,
                        java.lang.String phoneNumber)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: FEAAFacade
        Adds a new client to the system.

        Preconditions:
        The FEAAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a Client module via FEAAFacade.setClientProvider
        Postconditions:
        A new client with the given information will be present in the system.
        Specified by:
        addClient in interface FEAAFacade
        Parameters:
        fName - The client's first name. May not be null or empty.
        lName - The client's first name. May not be null or empty.
        phoneNumber - The client's phone number. May not be null or empty. May only contain digits, spaces, and +().
        Returns:
        The Client that has been added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the FEAAFacade has a null ClientProvider
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any argument requirements are breached

      • assignClient

        public void assignClient​(int clientID,
                         java.lang.String departmentCode)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: FEAAFacade
        Assigns a client to a department. Note that this is permanent.

        Preconditions:
        The FEAAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a Client module via FEAAFacade.setClientProvider
        Postconditions:
        The matching client will be assigned to the given department.
        Specified by:
        assignClient in interface FEAAFacade
        Parameters:
        clientID - The client to assign. Must be positive (may not be zero).
        departmentCode - The department to assign to. Must be one of the following: "DOMESTIC", "INTERNATIONAL", "LARGE ACCOUNTS".
        Shortened versions may also be used: "DOM", "INT", "LRG"
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the FEAAFacade has a null ClientProvider. If the given (valid) client ID does not match an unassigned client in the current client provider.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of the argument requirements are breached.

      • viewAllClients

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> viewAllClients()
        Description copied from interface: FEAAFacade
        Returns a list of all current clients represented by "last name, first name"

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        None
        Specified by:
        viewAllClients in interface FEAAFacade
        Returns:
        A list of all current clients represented by "last name, first name". In the case no clients can be found, returns an empty list.

        public java.util.List<Client> getAllClients()
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: FEAAFacade
        Returns a list of all current clients.

        Preconditions:

        Postconditions:
        None
        Specified by:
        getAllClients in interface FEAAFacade
        Returns:
        A list of all current clients represented by "last name, first name".
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the FEAAFacade has a null ClientProvider.

      • addAccount

        public int addAccount​(java.lang.Integer accountID,
                      int clientID,
                      java.lang.String accountName,
                      int initialIncomings,
                      int initialOutgoings)
               throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: FEAAFacade
        Adds an account to the given client

        Preconditions:
        The FEAAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a Client module via FEAAFacade.setClientProvider
        Postconditions:
        An account will be added to the given client with the provided details.
        Specified by:
        addAccount in interface FEAAFacade
        Parameters:
        accountID - The account ID must be unique, may not be negative, may not be zero. The account ID may be null, in which case a generated unique ID will be used. This is only available so long as all previous account IDs have been null - if an ID is provided, all future calls must also provide a unique ID.
        clientID - The client to assign. Must be positive (may not be zero).
        accountName - The name of the account to add. May not be null or empty.
        initialIncomings - The initial income portion of the account. May not be negative, may be zero.
        initialOutgoings - The initial outgoings portion of the account. May not be negative, may be zero.
        Returns:
        The id of the created account.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the FEAAFacade has a null ClientProvider. If the given (valid) client ID does not match a client in the current client provider.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of the argument requirements are breached.

      • getAccounts

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAccounts()
        Description copied from interface: FEAAFacade
        Returns a list of all current accounts.

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        None
        Specified by:
        getAccounts in interface FEAAFacade
        Returns:
        A list of all current accounts represented by "account id: account name". In the case no accounts can be found, returns an empty list.

      • getAccounts

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAccounts​(int clientID)
                                              throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                                     java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: FEAAFacade
        Returns a list of all current accounts matching the given client.

        Preconditions:
        The FEAAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a Client module via FEAAFacade.setClientProvider
        Postconditions:
        None
        Specified by:
        getAccounts in interface FEAAFacade
        Parameters:
        clientID - The client to assign. Must be positive (may not be zero).
        Returns:
        A list of all current account IDs owned by the given client. In the case no accounts can be found, returns an empty list.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the FEAAFacade has a null ClientProvider. If the given (valid) client ID does not match a client in the current client provider.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of the argument requirements are breached.

        Returns:

                             java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Specified by:
        getAccountBalance in interface FEAAFacade

      • setAccountIncomings

        public void setAccountIncomings​(int id,
                                int incomings)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: FEAAFacade
        Sets the income portion of the given account.

        Preconditions:
        The FEAAFacade must have been injected with a non-null instance of a Client module via FEAAFacade.setClientProvider
        Postconditions:
        The selected account incomings will reflect the new value.
        Specified by:
        setAccountIncomings in interface FEAAFacade
        Parameters:
        id - The account id to modify. Must be positive, may not be zero.
        incomings - The new incoming portion of the given account. May not be negative, may be zero.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the FEAAFacade has a null ClientProvider. If the given (valid) account ID does not match a known account
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of the argument requirements are breached.

        Postconditions:
        The selected account outgoings will reflect the new value.

        Parameters:

        outgoings - The new outgoing portion of the given account. May not be negative, may be zero.
        Throws:

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of the argument requirements are breached.

      • setClientProvider

        public void setClientProvider​(ClientList provider)
        Description copied from interface: FEAAFacade
        Injects a client module provider to the system

        Preconditions:
        None
        Postconditions:
        The system will call the given provider for all client related operations
        All accounts will be cleared, and the null ID state for new accounts will be reset.
        Specified by:
        setClientProvider in interface FEAAFacade
        Parameters:
        provider - The provider to inject. May be null, however this will result in some client related operations throwing exceptions.
